Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.handlers

This package contains ResultSet handlers for SQL queries used by the classes in the org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeAlarmListHandler Creates a result set handler that returns a list of matching AeAlarms.
AeAlarmListQueryHandler Implements a query handler that can transform a result set into a list of persisted alarm objects.
AeAttachmentItemResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that returns the first row of a ResultSet as a AeAttachmentItemEntry.
AeCoordinationDetailListResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that converts the next row of a ResultSet to an AeCoordinationDetail.
AeJournalEntriesLocationIdsResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that converts a ResultSet to a map from journal entry ids to location ids.
AeJournalEntriesResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that converts a ResultSet to a list of IAeJournalEntry instances.
AeLocationVersionResultSetHandler A SQL result set handler that returns a set of location id/version number tuples.
AeMessageReceiverHandler Creates a result set handler that returns an AeSQLMessageReceiver object.
AeMessageReceiverListHandler Creates a result set handler that returns a list of matching AeMessageReceivers.
AeSQLCoordinatingListResultSetHandler Resultset handler which creates and returns a list of IAeCoordinating objects.
AeSQLCoordinatingResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that converts the next row of a ResultSet to an IAeCoordinating.
AeSQLProcessIdsResultSetHandler Helper class to convert a ResultSet to a long[].
AeSQLProcessInstanceResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that converts the next row of a ResultSet to an AeProcessInstanceDetail.
AeSQLProcessListResultSetHandler Helper class to convert a ResultSet to an AeProcessListResult.
AeTransmissionTrackerResultSetHandler Creates a AeTransmissionTrackerEntry from the SQL result set.
AeURNMappingHandler Walks the result set building a map of urn to url values.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.handlers Description

This package contains ResultSet handlers for SQL queries used by the classes in the org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql package.
